title: PV system architectures
fullText:
The relation of a PV array to earth is determined byâ€”
(a) any functional earthing of the array in use; and
(b) the earth status of the application circuit to which the array is connected.
Both these issues affect safety of the array.
Manufacturer's instructions (including manufacturers of PCE) shall be taken into account in determining the most appropriate system earthing arrangement.
